# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-105">이 문서에는 모든 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의가 나열됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-105">This article lists all sensitive information type entity definitions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-106">각 정의는 DLP 정책이 각 유형을 검색하기 위해 검색하는 것을 보여줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-106">Each definition shows what a DLP policy looks for to detect each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-107">중요한 정보 유형에 대한 자세한 내용은 중요한 정보 [유형을 참조하세요.](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-108">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-109">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-110">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-112">00-12, 21-32, 61-72 또는 80 범위의 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-113">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-114">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-115">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-116">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-117">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-118">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-119">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-121">정책은 300자 이내의 접근성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도 중간 정도의 신뢰를 가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-122">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-123">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-124">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-134">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-134">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-137">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-137">routing #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-139">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-139">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-140">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-140">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-141">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-141">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-142">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-142">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-143">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-144">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-145">8자리 숫자(또는 기간이 없는 경우)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-146">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-147">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-148">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-149">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-150">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-151">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-152">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-153">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-154">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-155">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-156">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-157">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-158">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-161">Argentina National Identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-161">Argentina National Identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-163">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-163">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-164">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-164">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-165">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-165">documento nacional de identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-166">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-166">documento número</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-167">documento numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-167">documento numero</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-168">registro nacional de las personas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-168">registro nacional de las personas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-169">rnp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-169">rnp</span></span> 
   
## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-170">아르헨티나 고유 세금 식별 키(CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-171">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-172">대시가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-172">11 digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-174">대시가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-174">11 digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-175">20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 또는 34의 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-176">하이픈(-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-177">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-178">하이픈(-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-179">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-180">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-181">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-183">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-184">이 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-185">시작 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-186">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-187">이 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-188">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-188">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_unique_tax_key"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-189">Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-189">Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-190">Clave Unica de Identificacion Tributaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-190">Clave Unica de Identificacion Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-191">CUIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-191">CUIT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-192">고유한 랩 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-192">unique code of labour identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-193">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-193">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-194">고유한 실무 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-194">unique labour identification code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-195">CUIL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-195">CUIL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-196">고유 세금 식별 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-196">Unique Tax Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-197">고유 랩 식별 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-197">Unique Labour Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-198">랩 식별의 고유 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-198">Unique Key of Labour Identification</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-226">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-227">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-228">은행 지점 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-228">six to 10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-229">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-230">계정 번호는 6자리에서 10자리까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-231">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-232">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-233">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-234">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-235">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-236">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-237">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-238">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-239">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-240">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-241">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-242">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-243">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-244">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-245">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-245">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-246">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-246">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-247">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-247">swift bank code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-249">base currency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-249">base currency</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-250">usa account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-250">usa account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-251">holder address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-251">holder address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-252">bank address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-252">bank address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-253">information account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-253">information account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-254">fund transfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-254">fund transfers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-255">bank charges</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-255">bank charges</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-256">bank details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-256">bank details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-257">banking information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-257">banking information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-258">full names</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-258">full names</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-259">iaea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-259">iaea</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-260">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-260">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-261">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-262">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-263">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-264">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-265">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-266">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-267">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-268">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-268">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-269">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-270">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-270">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-271">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-271">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-272">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-272">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-273">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-274">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-275">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-276">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-277">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-277">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-278">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-279">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-279">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-280">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-281">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-282">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-282">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-283">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-283">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-284">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-285">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-288">australia business no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-288">australia business no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-290">abn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-290">abn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-291">businessid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-291">businessid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-292">비즈니스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-292">business id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-293">abn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-293">abn</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-295">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-295">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-296">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-297">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-298">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-299">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-300">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-301">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-302">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-303">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-303">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-305">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-305">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-306">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-306">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-307">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-307">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-308">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-308">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-309">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-309">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-310">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-310">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-311">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-312">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-312">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-313">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-314">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-314">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-315">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-315">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-316">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-317">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-318">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-318">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-319">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-319">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-321">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-321">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-322">australia company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-322">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-323">australia company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-323">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-324">australia company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-324">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-325">australian company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-325">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-326">australian company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-326">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-327">australian company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-327">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-328">호주 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-329">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-330">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-332">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-333">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-334">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-335">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-336">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-337">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-338">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-339">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-340">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-341">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-342">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-344">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-345">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-346">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-347">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-447">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-448">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-449">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-450">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-451">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-452">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-453">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-453">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-454">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-455">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-456">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-457">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-458">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-459">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-460">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-461">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-462">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-463">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-463">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-464">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-464">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-465">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-465">bank account details</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-467">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-467">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-468">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-468">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-474">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-475">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-476">영문자 8자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-478">한 문자(N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) 다음에 7자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by seven digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-479">두 문자(PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) 다음에 7자리가 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-479">Two letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by seven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-480">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-481">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-482">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-483">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-484">`Regex_australia_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-485">시작 `Keyword_australia_passport_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-486">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-487">`Regex_australia_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-507">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-508">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-509">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-511">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-512">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-513">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-514">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-515">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-516">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-517">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-518">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-519">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-520">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-521">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-522">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-523">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-524">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-524">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-535">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-536">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-537">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-538">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-539">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-540">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-541">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-542">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-543">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-544">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-545">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-672">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-673">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-674">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-675">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-676">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-677">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-678">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-679">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-680">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-681">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-682">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-683">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-684">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-685">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-686">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-688">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-689">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-690">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-691">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-693">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-696">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-697">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-698">문자 1개, 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-699">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-700">문자 1자, 숫자 7자 및 공백 1개 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-701">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-702">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-703">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-704">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-705">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-706">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-707">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-708">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-709">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-710">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-711">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-712">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-713">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-714">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-714">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-715">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-715">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-718">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-718">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-719">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-719">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-721">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-721">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-722">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-722">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-723">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-723">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-724">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-724">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-725">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-725">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-726">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-726">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-727">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-727">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-728">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-728">reisepasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-729">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-729">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-730">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-730">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-734">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-734">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-736">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-736">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-737">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-738">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-739">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-741">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-742">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-743">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-744">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-745">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-746">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-747">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-748">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-749">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-750">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-751">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-752">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-778">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-779">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-780">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-782">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-783">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-784">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-785">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-786">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-787">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-788">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-789">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-791">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-792">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-793">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-794">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-795">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-808">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-808">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-809">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-809">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-810">일자 수 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-810">taxidnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-812">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-812">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-813">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-813">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-814">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-814">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-815">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-815">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-816">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-816">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-817">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-817">tax number</span></span>
 
## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-818">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-819">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-820">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-821">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-822">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-823">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-824">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-825">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-826">11자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-828">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-829">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-830">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-831">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-832">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-833">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-834">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-835">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-836">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-837">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-838">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-839">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-840">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-841">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-842">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-843">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-844">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-845">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-846">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-847">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-847">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-848">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-848">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-849">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-849">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-850">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-850">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-851">austrian vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-851">austrian vat number</span></span>

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-864">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-865">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-866">문자열 "DocumentDb" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-868">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-869">3~200자 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-870">기호(>), 등호(=), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-871">대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-872">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-873">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-874">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-876">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-877">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-878">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-879">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-879">Keywords</span></span>
