### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1700">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1701">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1702">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1703">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1704">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1705">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1706">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 10진수와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1707">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1708">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1709">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1711">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1712">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1713">시작  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1714">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1715">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1760">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1761">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1762">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1763">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1764">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1765">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1766">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1767">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1768">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1769">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1770">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1771">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1772">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1773">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1774">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1786">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1786">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1787">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1787">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1791">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1791">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1794">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1795">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1796">7자리 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1797">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1798">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7자리 또는 12자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1799">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1800">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1801">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1802">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1803">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1804">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1805">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1806">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1807">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1808">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1809">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1810">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1811">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1812">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1813">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1814">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1838">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1839">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1840">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1841">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1842">다양한 패턴에 대한 다국어:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1842">Various patterns covering:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1843">앨버타</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1843">Alberta</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1844">British Columbia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1844">British Columbia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1845">매니토바</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1845">Manitoba</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1846">New Brunswick</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1846">New Brunswick</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1847">Newfoundland/Labrador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1847">Newfoundland/Labrador</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1848">Nova Scotia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1848">Nova Scotia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1849">오타리오</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1849">Ontario</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1850">Prince Edward Island</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1850">Prince Edward Island</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1851">퀘벡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1851">Quebec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1852">Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1852">Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1853">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1854">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1854">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1855">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1856">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1857">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1857">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1858">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1858">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1859">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1859">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1995">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1995">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1996">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1996">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1997">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1997">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1998">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1998">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-1999">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2000">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2000">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2001">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2001">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2002">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2002">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2003">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2003">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2004">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2004">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2005">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2005">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2006">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2006">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2010">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2010">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2011">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2011">speciality services</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2017">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2017">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2018">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2019">대문자 2자, 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2019">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2020">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2021">대문자 2자, 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2022">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2023">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2023">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2024">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2025">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2026">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2026">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2027">또는 Keyword_canada_passport_number Keyword_passport 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2027">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2057">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2057">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2058">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2059">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2059">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2060">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2061">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2062">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2063">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2064">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2065">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2065">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2066">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2066">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2067">두 개 이상의 Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2067">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2100">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2100">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2101">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2102">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2102">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2103">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2104">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2104">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2105">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2105">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2106">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2106">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2107">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2108">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2109">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2109">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2110">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2110">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2111">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2112">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2113">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2114">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2114">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2115">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2115">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2116">다음 패턴 중 두 개 이상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2116">At least two of the following patterns:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2117">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2117">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2118">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2118">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2119">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2119">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2120">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2120">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2121">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2122">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2122">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2123">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2123">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2124">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2125">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2125">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2126">Keyword_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2126">Keyword_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2127">sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2127">sin</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2149">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2149">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2150">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2151">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2151">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2153">7-8자리 숫자와 함께하는 데 10자리 숫자를 더한 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2154">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2154">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2155">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2155">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2156">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2156">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2157">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2158">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2159">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2159">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2160">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2160">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2161">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2162">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2162">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2163">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2164">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2164">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2165">이 Func_chile_id_card 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2165">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2166">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2166">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2167">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2168">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2169">이 Func_chile_id_card 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2169">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2170">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2207">중국 거주자 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2207">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2208">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2209">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2209">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2211">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2211">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2212">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2212">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2213">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2213">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2214">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2214">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2215">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2215">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2216">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2217">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2218">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2219">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2220">이 Func_china_resident_id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2220">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2221">검색된 Keyword_china_resident_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2221">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2222">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2223">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2223">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2224">이 Func_china_resident_id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2224">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2225">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2226">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2226">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2228">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2228">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2229">PRC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2229">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2230">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2230">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2231">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2231">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2232">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2232">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2233">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2233">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2234">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2234">鉴定</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2236">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2236">居民 身份證</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2238">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2238">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2239">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2240">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는(dddddd)될 수 있으며 Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2240">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2241">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2242">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 기프트 카드 및 다이너 카드를 비롯한 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드의 카드를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2242">Detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2243">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2244">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2244">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2245">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2246">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2246">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2247">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2247">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2248">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2248">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2249">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2249">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2250">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2250">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2251">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2251">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2252">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2253">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2253">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2254">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2254">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2255">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2515">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2516">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2517">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2517">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2518">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2519">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2519">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2520">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2521">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2521">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2522">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2523">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2523">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2524">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2524">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2525">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2525">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2649">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2649">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2650">이 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2650">This entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2651">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2651">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2652">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2653">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2653">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2654">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2655">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2655">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2656">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2657">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2658">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2659">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2659">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2660">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2660">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2661">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2661">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2692">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2692">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2693">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2694">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2694">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2695">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2696">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2696">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2697">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2698">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2698">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2699">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2700">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2701">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2701">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2702">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2703">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2704">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2705">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2705">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2706">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2724">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2724">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2725">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2726">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2726">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2727">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2728">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2728">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2729">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2729">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2730">마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2730">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2731">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2732">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2733">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2734">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2735">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2735">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2736">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2736">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2737">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2738">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2738">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2739">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2739">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2740">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2771">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2772">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2773">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2773">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2774">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2775">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2775">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2776">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2777">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2777">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2778">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2779">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2779">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2780">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2780">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2781">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2906">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2906">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2907">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2907">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2908">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2908">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2909">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2909">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2910">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2910">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2911">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2911">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2912">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2912">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2913">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2914">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2914">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2915">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2916">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2916">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2917">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2918">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2918">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2920">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2921">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2921">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2922">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2922">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2923">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2924">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2924">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2925">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2925">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2926">ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2926">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2927">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2927">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2928">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2928">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2929">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2929">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2930">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2930">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2931">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2931">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2932">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2933">1개 문자와 공백이나 따로 6-8자리 숫자(공백 또는 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2933">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2934">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2935">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2935">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2936">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2937">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2937">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2938">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2939">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2939">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2940">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2940">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2941">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2941">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2942">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD/MM/YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2942">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2943">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2944">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2944">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2945">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2945">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2974">키프로스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2975">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2976">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2977">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2978">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2979">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2980">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2981">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2982">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2983">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2984">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2985">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2986">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2987">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2988">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2989">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2989">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2990">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2991">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2992">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2993">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2994">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2995">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2996">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2996">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-2997">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-2997">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3012">tic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3012">tic#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3015">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3015">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3023">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3024">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3025">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3026">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3027">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3028">'E' 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3029">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3030">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3031">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3032">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3033">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3033">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3034">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3035">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3036">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3037">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-3038">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-3038">Keywords</span></span>
