## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5755">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5756">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5757">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5759">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5760">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5761">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5762">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5763">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5764">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5765">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5766">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5767">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5787">헝가리 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5788">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5789">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5790">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5791">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5792">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5793">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5794">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5795">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5796">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5797">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5798">"8"이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5799">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5800">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5801">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5802">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5803">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5804">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5805">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5806">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5807">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5808">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5809">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5810">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5810">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5811">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5811">adóazonosító szám</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5813">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5813">adószám</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5828">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5828">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5829">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5829">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5830">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5830">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5831">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5831">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5832">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5832">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5833">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5833">vat number</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5834">헝가리 부가가치 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5835">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5836">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5837">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5838">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5839">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5840">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5841">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5842">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5843">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5844">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5845">두 글자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5846">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5847">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5848">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5849">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5850">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5851">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5852">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5853">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5854">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5855">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5856">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5856">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5858">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5858">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5859">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5859">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5860">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5860">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5861">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5861">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5862">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5862">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5863">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5863">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5864">value added tax áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5864">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5865">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5865">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5866">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5866">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5867">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5867">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5868">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5868">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5869">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5870">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5871">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5872">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5873">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5874">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5875">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5876">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5877">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5878">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5879">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5880">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5881">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5882">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5883">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5884">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5885">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5886">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5887">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5887">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5889">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5889">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5890">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5890">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5891">인도 고유 ID(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5892">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5893">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5894">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5895">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5896">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5897">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5898">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5899">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5900">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5901">검사 숫자인 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5902">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5903">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5904">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5905">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5906">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5907">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5908">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5909">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5910">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5911">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5912">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5912">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5914">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5914">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5915">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5915">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5916">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5916">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5917">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5917">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5918">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5918">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5919">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5919">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5920">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5921">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5922">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5923">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5924">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5925">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5926">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5927">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5928">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5929">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5930">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5931">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5932">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5933">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5934">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5935">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5936">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5937">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5938">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5939">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5939">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5941">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5941">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5944">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5945">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5946">국가 코드(2문자) 및 검사 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5947">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5948">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5949">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5950">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5951">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5952">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5953">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5953">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5954">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5954">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5955">광고</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5955">ad</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5979">gl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5979">gl</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5992">lu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5992">lu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5993">lv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5993">lv</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5994">mc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5994">mc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-5995">md</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-5995">md</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6015">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6016">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6016">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6017">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6018">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6018">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6019">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6019">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6020">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6020">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6021">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6021">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6022">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6022">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6023">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6023">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6024">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6025">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6025">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6026">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6027">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6027">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6028">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6029">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6029">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6030">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6031">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6032">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6032">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6033">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6033">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6034">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6034">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6035">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6035">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6036">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6036">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6037">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6037">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6038">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6038">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6039">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)를](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6039">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6040">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6040">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6041">국제적인 병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6041">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6042">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6042">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6043">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6043">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6044">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6044">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6045">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6045">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6046">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6047">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6047">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6048">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6049">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6050">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6050">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6051">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6051">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6052">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6052">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6053">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6053">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6054">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6054">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6055">[ICD-9-CM(International Classification of Diseases,N9th Revision, ICD-9-CM)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6055">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6056">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6056">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6057">ICD-Dictionary_icd_9_codes 국제질병 [분류, 9번째 수정, ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6057">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6058">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6058">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6059">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6059">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6060">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6060">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6061">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6061">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6062">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는(기간) 및 서식 없는 버전(기간 없음)을 계정으로 표시하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6062">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6063">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6063">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6064">서식이 있는 IPv6 번호(콜론 포함)를 계정을 표시하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6064">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6065">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6065">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6066">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6067">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6068">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6069">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6069">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6070">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6070">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6071">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6071">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6072">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6072">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6073">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6073">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6074">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6074">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6075">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6075">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6076">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6076">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6077">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6077">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6078">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6078">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6079">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6079">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6080">IP(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6080">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6081">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6081">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6082">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6082">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6083">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6083">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6084">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6084">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6085">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6085">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6086">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6087">6자리 숫자와 문자 4자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6087">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6088">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6089">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6089">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6090">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6090">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6091">4개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6091">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6092">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6093">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6093">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6094">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6095">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6095">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6096">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6096">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6097">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6097">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6118">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6118">drivers lic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6220">ceadúnais tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6220">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6221">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6221">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6222">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6223">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6223">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6224">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6225">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6225">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6226">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6226">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6227">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6227">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6228">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6229">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6231">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6231">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6232">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6232">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6233">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6233">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6234">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6234">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6235">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6235">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6236">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6236">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6237">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6237">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6238">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6238">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6261">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6261">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6262">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6263">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6263">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6264">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6264">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6265">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6265">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6266">7자리 숫자와 문자 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6266">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6268">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6268">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6269">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6269">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6270">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6270">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6271">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6271">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6272">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6272">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6273">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6273">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6274">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6274">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6275">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6276">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6277">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6278">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6278">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6279">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6279">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6280">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6280">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6281">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6282">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6282">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6283">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6283">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6284">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6284">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6329">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6329">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6330">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6331">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6331">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6332">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6333">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6333">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6334">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6335">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6335">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6336">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6336">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6337">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6337">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6338">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6338">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6339">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6339">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6340">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6340">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6341">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6342">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6344">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6345">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6345">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6346">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6346">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6347">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6347">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6353">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6353">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6354">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6355">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6357">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6357">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6358">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6359">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6359">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6360">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6361">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6362">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6362">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6363">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6363">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6364">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6364">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6383">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6383">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6384">이 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6384">This type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6385">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6385">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6386">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6387">10자리 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6387">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6388">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6389">10자리 문자와 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6389">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6390">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6390">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6391">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6391">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6392">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6392">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6393">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6393">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6394">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6395">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6396">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6397">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6398">`Regex_italy_drivers_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6398">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6399">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6399">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6526">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6526">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6527">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6527">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6528">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6528">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6529">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6529">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6530">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6530">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6531">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6531">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6532">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6532">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6533">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6534">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6534">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6535">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6536">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6536">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6537">가족 이름의 처음 세 자석에 해당하는 3개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6537">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6538">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자석에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6538">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6539">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6539">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6540">생년월일 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6540">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6541">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자, 여성의 생년월일에 40자리 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6541">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6542">사람이 태어나는 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국 국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6542">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6543">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6543">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6544">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6545">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6545">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6546">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6547">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6548">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6548">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6549">시작  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6549">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6550">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-6551">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-6551">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
