## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10412">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10413">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10414">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10416">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10417">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10417">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10418">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10419">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10420">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10421">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10422">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10423">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10424">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10425">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10426">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10427">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10428">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10429">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10430">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10431">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10432">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10432">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10434">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10434">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10435">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10435">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10436">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10436">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10437">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10437">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10438">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10438">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10439">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10439">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10440">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10441">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10442">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10443">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10444">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10445">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10446">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10447">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10448">지정된 패턴에서 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10450">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10451">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10451">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10452">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10453">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10454">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10455">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10456">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10457">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만의 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10458">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10459">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10459">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10460">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10462">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10463">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10464">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10466">"M"을(를) 구분하는 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10467">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10468">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10469">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10470">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10470">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10471">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10472">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10473">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10474">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10475">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10476">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10507">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10508">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10509">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10511">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10512">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10513">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd"에서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10514">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10515">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미코론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10516">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 인용 부호(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10517">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10518">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10519">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10520">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10521">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10522">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10523">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10524">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10525">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10526">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10528">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10528">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10529">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10529">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10530">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10530">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10531">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10531">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10533">이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10533">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10534">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10534">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10535">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10535">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10536">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10536">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10537">기호(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10537">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10538">대/소문자, 숫자, 추가 문자(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자에 대한 1-200자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10538">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10539">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10541">이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10541">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10542">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10542">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10543">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10543">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10544">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10544">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10545">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10545">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10546">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10546">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10547">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10547">localhost</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10553">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10554">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10555">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10557">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10558">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10558">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10559">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10560">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10560">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10561">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10562">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10564">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10565">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10566">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10699">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10700">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10701">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10702">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10703">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10704">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10705">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10707">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10708">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10709">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10711">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10712">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10713">키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10714">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10715">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10716">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10717">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10736">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10737">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10738">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10739">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10740">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10741">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10742">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10743">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10744">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10745">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10746">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10747">`Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(01 JAN/JAN 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10748">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10749">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10750">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10751">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10751">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10753">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10753">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10754">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10754">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10755">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10755">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10756">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10756">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10757">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10757">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10758">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10758">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10759">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10759">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10760">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10760">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10786">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10787">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10788">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10789">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10790">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10791">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10792">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10793">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10794">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10795">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10796">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10797">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10798">더하기 기호 또는 마이너스 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10799">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 세 자리 숫자입니다. 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10800">1990년 전에 발급된 숫자의 경우 7번째와 8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외계인을 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10801">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성에 대해 홀수로 나타내거나 여성의 경우 조차도 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10802">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10802">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10803">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10804">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10804">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10806">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10807">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10808">시작  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10809">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10810">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10836">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10837">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10838">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10840">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10841">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10842">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10842">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10843">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10844">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10844">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10845">1~3자리 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10846">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10847">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10848">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10849">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10850">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10851">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10852">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10852">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_swift"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10853">Keyword_swift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10853">Keyword_swift</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10855">iso 9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10855">iso 9362</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10856">iso9362</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10856">iso9362</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10857">swift #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10857">swift#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10858">swiftcode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10858">swiftcode</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10859">swiftnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10859">swiftnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10860">swiftroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10860">swiftroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10861">swift code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10861">swift code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10862">swift number #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10862">swift number #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10863">swift routing number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10863">swift routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10864">bic number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10864">bic number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10865">bic code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10865">bic code</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10888">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10889">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10890">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10891">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10892">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10893">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10894">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10895">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10896">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10897">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10898">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10899">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10900">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10901">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10902">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10903">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10904">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10905">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10906">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10907">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10909">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10910">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10911">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10912">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10913">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10933">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10933">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10934">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10935">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10936">1개의 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10937">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10938">한 문자(영어) 다음에 9자리 숫자를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10939">한 글자(영어로, 대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10940">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10941">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10942">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10943">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10944">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10945">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10946">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10947">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10948">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10949">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10950">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10951">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10952">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10952">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10955">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10955">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10956">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10956">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10957">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10957">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10958">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10958">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10959">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10959">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10960">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10960">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10961">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10961">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10962">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10962">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10963">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10963">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10964">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10964">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10965">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10965">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10966">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10966">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10967">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10967">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10968">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10969">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10970">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10971">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10972">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10973">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10974">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10974">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10975">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10976">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10977">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10978">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10979">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10980">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10981">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10982">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10983">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10984">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10984">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10985">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10985">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10986">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10986">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10987">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10987">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10988">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10988">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10989">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10989">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10990">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10990">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10991">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10991">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10992">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10992">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10993">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10993">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10994">대만 거주 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10995">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10996">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10997">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10998">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-10999">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11000">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11000">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11001">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11002">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11003">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11004">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11005">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11006">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11007">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11007">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11008">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11008">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11009">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11009">Resident Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11011">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11011">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11012">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11012">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11013">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11013">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11014">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11014">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11015">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11015">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11016">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11016">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11017">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11017">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11018">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11018">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11019">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11019">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11020">태국어 인구 ID 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11021">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11022">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11023">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11024">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11025">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11026">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11027">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11028">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11029">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11030">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11031">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11032">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11033">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11034">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11035">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11035">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11036">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11036">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11037">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11037">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11038">Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11038">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11043">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11044">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11045">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11045">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11046">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11047">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11048">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11049">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11050">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11051">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11052">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11052">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11053">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11053">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11054">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11055">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11056">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11056">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11058">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11058">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11059">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11059">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11062">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11063">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11064">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11065">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11066">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11067">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11068">5개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11069">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11070">생년월일의 날짜 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11071">드라이버가 여성인 경우 일곱 번째 문자가 50으로 증가합니다. 시험의 경우 01에서 12까지가 아니라 51에서 62까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11072">대소문자 2개(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11073">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11074">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11075">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11076">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11077">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11078">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11079">시작 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11080">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11081">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11082">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11083">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
