## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11204">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11205">선택 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11206">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11207">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11208">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11209">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11210">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11211">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11212">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11213">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11214">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11215">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11216">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11216">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11218">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11218">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11219">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11219">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11220">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11220">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11221">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11221">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11222">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11223">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11224">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11225">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11227">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11228">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11229">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11229">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11230">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11230">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11231">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11231">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11232">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11233">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11234">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11235">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11236">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11237">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11238">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11239">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11240">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11241">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11242">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11256">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11256">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11257">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11257">D.O.B</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11259">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11259">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11260">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11262">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11263">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11264">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11265">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11266">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11267">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11268">두 문자(유효한 NINOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11269">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11270">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11271">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11272">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11273">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11274">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11275">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11276">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11277">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11278">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11279">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11280">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11281">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11282">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11284">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11285">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11286">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11287">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11288">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11310">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11311">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11312">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11313">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11314">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11314">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11315">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11316">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11316">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11317">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11317">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11318">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11319">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11320">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11321">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11321">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11322">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11323">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11323">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11324">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11325">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11326">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11326">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11327">시작  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11327">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11347">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11347">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11348">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11349">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11349">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11350">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11351">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11352">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11353">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11354">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11355">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11356">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11357">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11387">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11388">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11389">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11390">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11391">주에 따라 다를 수 있습니다. 예: 뉴욕:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11392">ddd ddd ddd와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11393">dddddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11394">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11395">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11396">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11397">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11398">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11399">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11400">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11401">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11402">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11403">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11404">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11405">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11503">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11504">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11505">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자이며 선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식이 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11506">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11507">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11508">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11508">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11509">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11509">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11510">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11510">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11511">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11512">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11512">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11513">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11513">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11514">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11515">unformatted:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11516">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11516">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11517">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11517">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11518">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11519">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11520">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11521">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11522">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11523">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11524">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11525">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11526">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11527">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11528">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11529">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11530">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11531">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11532">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11532">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11533">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11533">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11534">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11534">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11535">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11535">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11536">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11536">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11537">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11537">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11538">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11538">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11539">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11539">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11540">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11540">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11541">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11541">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11542">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11542">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11543">에 대한 나타</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11543">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11544">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11544">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11545">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11546">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11547">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11548">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강력합니다. 이 서식은 숫자의 특정 부분이 특정 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11549">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11550">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 찾아보세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11551">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년보다 강력한 서식이 있는 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 서식이 지정되지 않은 강력한 2011 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 공백(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd d)으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로폼이 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11555">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11556">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11557">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11558">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11559">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11560">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11561">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11562">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11563">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11564">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11565">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11566">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11567">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11568">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11569">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11570">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11570">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11571">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11571">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11572">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11572">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11573">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11573">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11574">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11574">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11575">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11575">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11576">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11576">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11577">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11577">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11578">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11578">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11579">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11579">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11580">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11580">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11581">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11581">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11582">SS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11582">SS#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11583">SSID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11583">SSID</span></span>
   
## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11584">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11585">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11586">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11587">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11588">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11589">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11590">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11591">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11592">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11593">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11594">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11595">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11596">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11597">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11598">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11599">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11615">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11615">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11616">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11616">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11617">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11617">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11618">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11618">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11619">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11619">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11620">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11620">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11621">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11621">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11622">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11623">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11624">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11625">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11625">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11626">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11627">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11629">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11630">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11630">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11631">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11631">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11632">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11632">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11633">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11633">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11634">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11634">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11635">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11635">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11636">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11636">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11637">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11637">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11638">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11638">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11639">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11639">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11640">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11640">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11641">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11641">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11642">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11642">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11643">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11643">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11644">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11644">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11645">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11645">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11646">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11646">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11647">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11648">8자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11648">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11649">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11650">8자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11650">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11651">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11651">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11652">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11652">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11653">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11654">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11655">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11656">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11656">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11657">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11657">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11658">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11658">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11659">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11659">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11660">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11660">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11661">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11661">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11662">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11662">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11663">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11663">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11664">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11664">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e8c78-11665">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e8c78-11665">номер паспорта</span></span>
